entry.title: Boot LiveUSB in VirtualBox 4.3.18
entry.summary:
Steps

1.

$ sudo chown m157q /dev/disk1

2.

$ VBoxManage internalcommands createrawvmdk -filename ~/VirtualBox\ VMs/win7_test.vmdk -rawdisk /dev/disk1

3.

  • Create New Machine in VirtualBox and select the generated .vmdk file as the hard drive.
    • Use an existing virtual hard drive file while addding the Hard drive.

4.

  • Boot the virtual machine.

entry.title: VirtualBox Guest additions upgrade: install_x11_startup_app: no script given
entry.summary:
I encountered this problem while I was doing the upgrade for the guest additions of VirtualBox.

Guest OS: Ubuntu 14.04

Remove the following symlinks before you install the new version of the Guest addtions

# rm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/VBoxGuestAdditions
# rm /usr/lib/VBoxGuestAdditions
# rm /usr/share/VBoxGuestAdditions

entry.title: Solution for the Failure to Attach USB Device in VirtualBox
entry.summary:
Solution

  • virtualbox.org • View topic - Failed to Attach the USB Device SigmaTel, Inc. STIr42xx

Steps

  1. Settings
  2. Ports
  3. USB
  4. Add a new USB Filter
  5. Choose device which cannot be attached
  6. Clear all fields except the name
  7. Unplug the USB device
  8. Plug in the USB device again
  9. Attach the USB device to guest

This method should work.
